about_the_game:
SneakBit – Rewrite Your Destiny

Awaken in a mysterious world shrouded in danger, magic, and intrigue. In SneakBit, you’ll embark on a journey through breathtaking pixel-art landscapes, face relentless demonic foes, and uncover a prophecy that may not be your own. Will you embrace the role of a hero, or will the truth reveal a different path?

Features:

  • Thrilling Adventure: Explore a vibrant, handcrafted world filled with secrets, peril, and wonder. From tranquil villages to treacherous dungeons, every step reveals something new.

  • Dynamic Combat: Face demons with skill and strategy as you master a unique approach to battle. Adapt and evolve to overcome ever-greater challenges.

  • Memorable Characters: Meet a cast of allies, rivals, and enigmatic figures who will shape your journey. Their stories intertwine with yours in unexpected and meaningful ways.

  • An Unfolding Mystery: Dive into a rich narrative where ancient powers and forgotten truths collide. The prophecy you uncover may not play out as you imagined.

  • A World Full of Possibilities: Choose your path, complete quests at your own pace, and discover hidden tales that bring the world to life.

Destiny awaits in SneakBit, but will it be yours to claim? Adventure through a land of magic and shadows, and find your place in this unforgettable tale. Play now!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.6+, PopOS 22.04+
  • Processor: Any dual core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on SteamOS 3.6.2, PopOS 22.04 LTS
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.6+, PopOS 22.04+
  • Processor: AMD 1600 / Intel i5 4th gen or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on SteamOS 3.6.2, PopOS 22.04 LTS
